edu.harvard.util.graph

Class BaseGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.util.graph.BaseGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Graph

    public abstract class BaseGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A graph represented as a collection of nodes and edges
    Author:
    Peter Macko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
        the instantiated summary node of type SummaryNode if possible, or BaseSummaryNode if not

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the instantiated summary node of type SummaryNode if possible, or BaseSummaryNode if not

        to - the to node
